channel.title: Comments on: London Meetup for Domino Community

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Same here, I wish I could get to CU, but time is a precious commodity at the moment. There's always time for beer though <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Same here, I wish I could get to CU, but time is a precious commodity at the moment. There’s always time for beer though http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Stuart McIntyre
item.dc:creator: Stuart McIntyre
item.description: <p>Not sure if I'll make it to CU, but definitely up for the get together on the 20th - a cracking idea...</p>
item.content:encoded: Not sure if I’ll make it to CU, but definitely up for the get together on the 20th – a cracking idea…
